snippet: “The Dictator,” the latest movie from Sacha Baron Cohen, features a new guise for that actor: an African despot who takes up residence in Brooklyn.
abstract: Comedian Sacha Baron Cohen stays in character while publicizing The Dictator, his first fully scripted movie.
lead_paragraph: “The Dictator,” the latest movie from Sacha Baron Cohen, features a new guise for that actor: an African despot who takes up residence in Brooklyn.

headline.seo: Sacha Baron Cohen Stars in ‘The Dictator’
headline.main: Comic Guerrilla Tries Sticking With the Script
headline.print_headline: Comic Guerrilla Tries Sticking With the Script
